alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Keokuk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Keokuk and central Iowa Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 347 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Victor to near Delta. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Marengo around 400 AM CDT. South English around 405 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include North English, Parnell and Millersburg. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 206 and 222. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
